text: This is a list of episodes of Ikaw ay Pag-Ibig which aired on ABS-CBN's Primetime Bida evening block from November 21, 2011 to January 27, 2012. The series was directed by Jerome Chavez Pobocan, Jojo A. Saguin, and Erick C.
